column1: # Events that are in vanilla id range

# or new options for existing events

column2: The more the better! Welcome this little bastard in the tribe.
For a long time we Gospodars ruled here and we shed our blood with other people of these lands. The time has to come unite with them and create new great Kislev!
Let there one nation, one people!
Gospodars, Ungols and other people of Kislev once divieded now are creating family bonds and adopting new identity.
More and more people in Kislev is adpoting new identity. Some of courtiers also embraced new ways.
Whole real is adopoted new Kisleverain. My servants infrom me that it is increasingly popular to show new customs and speak new Kislevarin amongst Ungol and Gospodar Boyars and Szlachta..
My wise liege has persuaded me to adpot new customs and new identity - I am not gospodar or ungol now I've became Kislevite!.
It was high time for it.
